title: This is setting a very dangerous trend in mob justice. Must be curbed in bud otherwise it can turn very ugly.
selftext:
[https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/agartala/tripura-panchayat-member-instigates-mob-to-strip-woman-beat-her-up-after-son-caught-stealing-money/articleshow/102941446.cms?from=mdr](https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/agartala/tripura-panchayat-member-instigates-mob-to-strip-woman-beat-her-up-after-son-caught-stealing-money/articleshow/102941446.cms?from=mdr)

After buldozer justice, there have been few incidents of mob justice involving stripping women. This could lead to very ugly incidents as the already perverted mob would do this at the slightest provocation. Strictest action needs to be taken.
comments: Opposition should push for judicial reforms.No other way the conditions can be improved
